addOneResource(Map<Resource, Integer>, Resource) - Static method in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Resource
this static method adds one resource to a map of resources, and returns the new map (not old one modified) example1: map1={(coin,1),(servant,2)} resource = servant => return = {(coin,1), (servant,3)} example2: map1={(coin,1),(servant,2)} resource = stone => return={(coin,1), (servant,2), (stone,1)}
addResource() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.LeaderCard
this method is for the slots card ability, it's redefined in that type of card, in the other types of cards it doesn't do anything.
addResource() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.LeaderCardSlots

you give to this method a map of resources and it adds the resources in the strongbox (so in the end you have in the strongbox the old resources + the new resources)
